name: Add Region by Country for WooCommerce
author: C-Metric

sections.description:
Add Region by Country WooCommerce Add-on plug-in.

Features of the plugin include:

  • Provide solution for add new region from any allowed country on WooCommerce. *
  • Simple-configuration – just install,setup and enjoy.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload add-region-by-country-for-woocommerce.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the menu name WooCommerce->Add Region And here we can able to add custom Region
  4. Here we can able to see Country list and textbox for Region List.
  5. After click on this page we can see configuration form.
  6. Now just configure & see the result on checkout page.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First Public Release
  • A new version of Add Region by Country WooCommerce Add-on plug-in.

1.0.1

  • Resolved Fatal error from the code: Fatal error: Uncaught Error: Call to undefined function and fixed some warnings.
  • Tested Plugin With WordPress Latest Version.

1.0.2

  • Resolved Fatal error: Uncaught Error: Call to undefined function is_plugin_active()

1.0.3

  • Tested with latest updated version
